title: One Piece Episode #545 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: A review of episode 545 discussing the flashback arc and Otohime's confrontation with Mjosgard. The review notes that while the episode brings intriguing material, the extended flashback can feel lengthy for viewers wanting to return to the present.

title: 545-546: Shaking Fish-Man Island! A Celestial Dragon Drifts In! and A Sudden Tragedy! a Gunshot Shuts Down the Future!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's reaction to episodes 545-546, describing Otohime as 'a clever, determined, hopeful ray of sunshine only interested in a better future for Fishman Island' and comparing her to Luffy in her refusal to give up against all hope.

title: The Celestial Dragon Abducts Otohime! The Fishman Island Welcomes A Visitor
author: Unknown
description: A detailed summary of episode 545 covering Mjosgard's arrival, the confrontation with former slaves, and Otohime's intervention.

title: The One Piece Podcast Episode 545, Tic Tac Toe Chin
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Episode 545 of The One Piece Podcast featuring hosts Ed and Alex with special guest Stephen Paul (Official Translator for One Piece) for a Manga Recap of One Piece Chapter 924. Note: The podcast episode number does not correspond to the anime episode number.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses manga content from the Wano arc

title: One Piece Episode 545 UNCUT REACTION
author: BOLDcast
description: An uncut reaction video to One Piece episode 545 available to Patreon supporters of BOLDcast.

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 539 – 553) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the Fishman Island arc episodes 539-553, which includes episode 545's events within the broader arc analysis.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fishman Island flashback and present-day arc
